about.details:
Incorporated in 2020, EP Biocomposites Limited is the manufacturer and supplier of fibre reinforced polymers (FRP) products such as door shutters, frames, Biodigestor Tanks, Bio toilets and allied products for construction and Industrial applications which meets customer requirements. The Company got into the high potential sector of wastewater recycling in 2021.

The company focus on giving sanitation solutions to those who do not have access to toilets, as well as to those who have toilets but face trouble treating and managing the waste through septic tanks. The company also provide sanitation infrastructure and human waste management solutions and services, involving innovative and simple bio-digester technology licensed from the Defence Research and Development Organisation (DRDO) and Industry Interface and Technology Management, operating under the aegis of DRDO, Ministry of Defence, Government of India.

EP Biocomposites Limited has supplied more than 2,00,000 doors, thereby saving thousands of trees and has supplied more than 2,500 Bio toilets to households, helping in the reduction of open defecation thereby contributing to clean and green surroundings.

The revenue from operations was Rs 805.96, Rs 294.80 lakhs and Rs 56.81 lakhs for Fiscal 2022, 2021 and 2020 respectively.

faqs.question: What is the EP Biocomposites IPO?
faqs.answer:
EP Biocomposites IPO is a SME IPO of 504000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹6.35 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹126 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1000.

The IPO opens on August 29, 2022, and closes on September 5, 2022.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in EP Biocomposites IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in EP Biocomposites IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in EP Biocomposites IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in EP Biocomposites IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'EP Biocomposites IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When EP Biocomposites IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The EP Biocomposites IPO opens on August 29, 2022 and closes on September 5, 2022.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of EP Biocomposites IPO?
faqs.answer: EP Biocomposites IPO lot size is 1000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,26,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for EP Biocomposites IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in EP Biocomposites IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is EP Biocomposites IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for EP Biocomposites IPO will be done on Thursday, September 8, 2022, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Monday, September 12, 2022. Check the EP Biocomposites IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is EP Biocomposites IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The EP Biocomposites IPO listing date is on Tuesday, September 13, 2022.
